about_the_game:
From the lone Tibetan monk standing atop the misty mountain peak to the mysterious ninja racing across the village rooftops, the mystical element invoked by the melody of the traditional Chinese violin called the Erhu (Japanese Niko) is a true treat for the listener's ears.

Heaven and Earth, composed by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, features masterful compositions in collaboration with Otori Ayaka - a Niko player from Japan. With 12 BGM themes and 36 ME sounds, this audio bundle is a great addition to modern and classic fantasy games alike. Blending tradition with modern instrumentation, Heaven and Earth is a cinematic-quality experience that will enchant the developer and the player alike.

Features:

  • 12 BGM themes.
  • 36 ME themes.
  • Authentic instruments and original composition.
  • .M4A, .OGG and .MP3 formats included.
  • Tested in and formatted for RPG Maker MV.
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Heaven and Earth Music Pack" and "RPG Maker MV - Heaven and Earth Music Pack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
